title: Ram Fight With Monster
description: Rama Fights with the Demoness Tadaka: Lord Rama confronts the terrifying demoness Tadaka, whose destructive powers threaten the peace of the forest and the lives of innocent sages.

title: Ram Fight With Demons
description: Rama Fights with Demons: Lord Rama battles a fierce group of demons, including the monstrous Surpanakha and the powerful Maricha, to protect his family and restore peace to the land.
